card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"如果进入B站后发现无法打开放送科的视频，也还请稍安勿躁，不要对官方和网站本身进行攻击。\n由于突发事态，圣翔音乐学院放送科的视频全部被退回且锁定。今后将如何与各位朋友分享与交流少女歌剧相关内容，我们会尽力在既定框架内寻找更适宜的办法。","id":15336379,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1276,"img_size":170.1669921875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/207a67710b5ca658977195e3f7dec8560c4cda66.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":750},{"img_height":1272,"img_size":179.0283203125,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/13b327ded62e8a204be2d8d3fc853f72ac902497.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":750},{"img_height":1274,"img_size":175.7373046875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/7ee19b43418cca10d776b124859c318ef099b2d3.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":750},{"img_height":1270,"img_size":206.1923828125,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/285d1248f237bf93da954b9c9fe0645a248117a3.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":750}],"pictures_count":4,"reply":501,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1549869677},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
